account.disclaimer_full: Information following may not show account information 100% right.
account.requested: Awaiting approval. Click to undo your ask for following status
boost_modal.combo: You can press {combo} to skip this next time
bundle_column_error.body: Something went wrong while loading this component.
bundle_column_error.title: Network error
bundle_modal_error.message: Something went wrong while loading this component.
column_back_button.label: Back
compose_form.hashtag_warning: This toot won't be listed under any hashtag as it is unlisted. Only public toots can be searched by hashtag.
compose_form.lock_disclaimer: Your account is not {locked}. Anyone can follow you to view your follower-only posts.
compose_form.spoiler_placeholder: Put your warning in this spot
confirmations.block.message: Are you sure you want to block {name}?
confirmations.delete.message: Confirm you want to discard this status?
confirmations.delete_list.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this list?
confirmations.domain_block.message: Are you really, really sure you want to block the entire {domain}? In most cases a few targeted blocks or mutes are sufficient and preferable.
confirmations.mute.message: Are you sure you want to mute {name}?
confirmations.unfollow.message: Are you sure you want to unfollow {name}?
embed.instructions: Embed this status on your website by copying the code below.
embed.preview: Here is what it will look like:
emoji_button.label: Insert emoji
empty_column.community: The local activity list is empty. Write something publicly to get the ball rolling!
empty_column.hashtag: There is nothing in this hashtag yet.
empty_column.home: Your home activity list is empty! Visit {public} or use search to get started and meet other users.
empty_column.list: There is nothing in this list yet. When members of this list post new statuses, they will appear here.
empty_column.notifications: You don't have any notifications yet. Interact with others to start the conversation.
empty_column.public: There is nothing here! Write something publicly, or manually follow users from other instantiations to fill it up
getting_started.heading: Starting Out
getting_started.open_source_notice: Mastodon is "FOSS". You can add contributions or log a bug on GitHub at {github}.
keyboard_shortcuts.column: to focus a status in one of the columns
keyboard_shortcuts.down: to move down in the list
keyboard_shortcuts.heading: Keyboard shortcuts
keyboard_shortcuts.toot: to start a brand new toot
keyboard_shortcuts.up: to move up in the list
loading_indicator.label: Loading...
missing_indicator.label: Not found
missing_indicator.sublabel: This resource could not be found
notification.favourite: {name} put a star on your status
notification.mention: You got a tag in {name}'s status
notification.reblog: Your status got a boost from {name}
notifications.clear_confirmation: Confirm that you want to discard all your notifications?
onboarding.page_five.public_timelines: The local activity list shows public posts from everyone on {domain}. The global activity list shows public posts from everyone who people on {domain} follow. These are the Public Activity Lists, a great way to discover new people.
onboarding.page_four.home: The home activity list shows posts from people you follow.
onboarding.page_four.notifications: The notifications column shows when someone interacts with you.
onboarding.page_one.federation: Mastodon is a network of independent servers joining up to make one larger social network. We call these servers instantiations.
onboarding.page_one.handle_hint: This is what you would tell your friends to search for.
onboarding.page_six.apps_available: There are {apps} available for iOS, Android and other platforms.
onboarding.page_six.github: Mastodon is free open-source software. You can report bugs, request features, or contribute to the code on {github}.
onboarding.page_three.profile: Edit your profile to change your avatar, bio, and display name. There, you will also find other preferences.
onboarding.page_three.search: Use the search bar to find people and look at hashtags, such as {illustration} and {introductions}. To look for a person who is not on this instantiation, use their full handle.
onboarding.page_two.compose: Write posts from the compose column. You can upload images, change privacy settings, and add content warnings with the icons below.
privacy.unlisted.long: Do not post to public activity lists
regeneration_indicator.label: Loading…
regeneration_indicator.sublabel: Your home feed is being prepared!
report.forward_hint: The account is from another server. Send an anonymized copy of the report there as well?
report.hint: The report will be sent to your instantiation mods. You can provide an explanation of why you are reporting this account below:
search_popout.tips.full_text: Simple text returns statuses you have written, favourited, boosted, or have been mentioned in, as well as matching usernames, display names, and hashtags.
search_popout.tips.text: Simple text returns matching display names, usernames and hashtags
ui.beforeunload: Your draft will be lost if you leave Mastodon.
upload_area.title: Drag & drop to upload
upload_button.label: Add an audiovisual thing
upload_progress.label: Uploading...
